actionCalls.description: An end point for the flow. Actions/screens that need to have fault error handling and that are at the end of the flow, can use this for the 'normal' end flow.
actionCalls.name: End
actionCalls.label: End

actionCalls.description: Searches for Dutch dossiers in the Dutch Chamber of Commerce
actionCalls.name: Search_for_Dutch_Dossiers
actionCalls.label: Search for Dutch Dossiers

assignments.description: Assigns the country selected in the search screen to a list

Flow.description: Search for organisations through CreditSafe or through the Dutch Chamber of Commerce. When an organisation has been found and selected fetches this organisation and inserts it into Salesforce as a Business Dossier.
Flow.label: Organisation Search Flow

variables.description: The house number addition searched for
variables.name: HouseNumberAddition

variables.description: The phone number used in the search
variables.name: PhoneNumber

variables.description: The trade name to search for
variables.name: TradeName
